name: Special Topics in Studio Practice
description: An in-depth examination of selected performance disciplines, styles, and genres within their historical and critical context. Content may vary depending on instructor. Please check Studio Topics on the CDTPS undergraduate web page for more details.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: Minimum 70% in required courses: DRM100Y1/DRM101Y1/(UNI102H1, UNI106H1)/UNI102Y1; DRM200Y1; or permission of the Centre.
